dialog.text: The lower 50 is mountain and the 20%of the lower sky on the left is mountain with the rest all clouds
Are there any peaks in the mountains?
Yes there is a peak, and a river flows next to the mountain
How tall is the peak? Where is it located? How wide is the river and what shape is it?
The peak occupies 20% of the SKY on the left and the river flows from right top end of the lower half and flows to the bottom left corner. width of the river at the end is about 30%
is the peak steep? is there grass surrounding the river?
the peak is steep and tress surrounding river. Partially cloudy layer just above the mountains
Is the mountain all the way to the left? Are the trees filling the rest of the screen below the mountains? Are the clouds everywhere?
The river has been drawn the wrong way. It flows from bottom left to top right.
